blogPost.title: What groups are most marginalized regarding access to fertility treatment? Answer by @tammysun, CEO and co-founder @CarrotFertility. https://t.co/tZPnjk9F7O https://t.co/oGC3XqqmCF
blogPost.author: Quora

localize.full_text: 不妊治療へのアクセスに関して、最も疎外されているグループはどこですか？回答者：@tammysun, CEO and co-founder @CarrotFertility. https://t.co/tZPnjk9F7O https://t.co/oGC3XqqmCF
在获得生育治疗方面，哪些群体最被边缘化？由@tammysun，首席执行官和联合创始人@CarrotFertility回答。https://t.co/tZPnjk9F7O https://t.co/oGC3XqqmCF
在獲得生育治療方面，哪些羣體最被邊緣化？由@tammysun，首席執行官和聯合創始人@CarrotFertility回答。https://t.co/tZPnjk9F7O https://t.co/oGC3XqqmCF

previous.title: What advice do you give to anyone who is interested in becoming a local journalist? Answer by Ken Ward Jr., Reporter at The Charleston Gazette-Mail, West Virginia. https://t.co/IMhc7gHoad https://t.co/ozDz1EOepN

localize.full_text: ローカルジャーナリストを目指す人にアドバイスをお願いします。回答：Ken Ward Jr., The Charleston Gazette-Mail (West Virginia) レポーター https://t.co/IMhc7gHoad https://t.co/ozDz1EOepN
对于有兴趣成为当地记者的人，你有什么建议？回答者：Ken Ward Jr.，西弗吉尼亚州《查尔斯顿公报-邮报》的记者。https://t.co/IMhc7gHoad https://t.co/ozDz1EOepN
對於有興趣成爲當地記者的人，你有什麼建議？回答者：Ken Ward Jr.，西弗吉尼亞州《查爾斯頓公報-郵報》的記者。https://t.co/IMhc7gHoad https://t.co/ozDz1EOepN

next.title: How did you find your life purpose? Answer by @tonystubblebine, Founded @coachdotme. https://t.co/rriEraDS2J https://t.co/BkQnE5Mdgj

localize.full_text: どうやって人生の目的を見つけたのですか？Answer by @tonystubblebine, Founded @coachdotme. https://t.co/rriEraDS2J https://t.co/BkQnE5Mdgj
你是如何找到你的人生目标的？由@tonystubblebine回答，创办了@coachdotme。https://t.co/rriEraDS2J https://t.co/BkQnE5Mdgj
你是如何找到你的人生目標的？由@tonystubblebine回答，創辦了@coachdotme。https://t.co/rriEraDS2J https://t.co/BkQnE5Mdgj
